Proficiency-Options.label: Basic
Proficiency-Options.description: I am only able to communicate in this language through written communication

Proficiency-Options.label: Conversational
Proficiency-Options.description: I know this language well enough to verbally discuss project details with a client

Proficiency-Options.label: Fluent
Proficiency-Options.description: I have command of this language with perfect grammer

Proficiency-Options.label: Native or Bilingual
Proficiency-Options.description: I have complete command of this language, including breadth of vocabulary, idioms, and colloguialisms
